question: Which of the following statements is correct about the Setu Bharatam programme?
option1: It is a proposed project to create a shipping route in the shallow strait between India and Sri Lanka
option2: It aims for building road and railway bridges for safe and seamless travel on National Highways
option3: It focuses on port-led development through coastal economic zones (CEZs) across all the nine maritime states in the country
option4: It aims towards the construction of freight corridors traversing the entire country to provide a safe and efficient freight transportation system.
answer: It aims for building road and railway bridges for safe and seamless travel on National Highways
explanation: The Union Government had launched the Setu Bharatam programme in 2016 with the aim of building Rail Over Bridges (ROBs), or Rail Under Bridges (RUBs) at railway crossings, and road bridges to ensure safe and seamless travel on National Highways. The Setu-Bharatam programme aims to make all National Highways free of railway level crossings by 2019. The Ministry of Road Transport & Highways has also established an Indian Bridge Management System (IBMS) with an aim to carry out conditions survey of all bridges on National Highways in India.
